Text:
As you can see from the comments, fscracks, no one gives a fuck about shitty little Yurop airports.

God damn Eurofags...

Thank you, There are lots of real FS pilots that want all the airports they can get no matter where in the world they are.
Sadly most do not stop to say thanks to the uploader and I am sometimes guilty of this myself. But when I see negative cooments from some moron I want to make it clear most of us are grateful.
Thank you for sharing fscracks  \m/
WOW, i'm still amazed at human moronity.  How can one complain of fr** stuff....if you dont want just discard.  And by the way, concerning your ungratefulness...JUST GO FUCK YOURSELF!

Thanks for this upload.
Getting fed up with FSX so reverting back to FS2004 and need all the scenery add-ons I can get
